detectors.description: LFT.calculateTokenTier(uint256) (contracts/LFT.sol#234-242) uses a weak PRNG: randomChance <= MAX_TIER1_DROP_CHANCE (contracts/LFT.sol#237)
LFT.getRandom(uint256,uint256) (contracts/LFT.sol#286-289) uses a weak PRNG: randomHash (contracts/LFT.sol#288)
LFT.setTokenTierBunch(uint256,uint256) (contracts/LFT.sol#245-274) uses a weak PRNG: _tier1Tokens[randomTokenId] == true (contracts/LFT.sol#267)

LFT.getRandom(uint256,uint256) (contracts/LFT.sol#286-289) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: randomHash = uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(block.timestamp,msg.sender,seed,block.difficulty))) % modulus (contracts/LFT.sol#287)
detectors.markdown: [LFT.getRandom(uint256,uint256)](crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x7c6f282efbe06e93de4ab5e646478bee20f966b8-LFT/contracts/LFT.sol#L286-L289) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: [randomHash = uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(block.timestamp,msg.sender,seed,block.difficulty))) % modulus](crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x7c6f282efbe06e93de4ab5e646478bee20f966b8-LFT/contracts/LFT.sol#L287)
